wikipedia_page.main: Charles Romilly (1808 – 26 August 1887) was an English cricketer with amateur status. He was associated with Marylebone Cricket Club (MCC) and made his first-class debut in 1828.

response: * Lady Georgiana Elizabeth Russell (d. 22 March 1867), married Charles Romilly and had issue
